Summary: JET IN AREA, SAW REFLECTION BELOW JET AND TOOK PICTURES-REVIEWED PICTURES AND ORBS ARE IN PHOTOS
trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Charlotte
There were no other sightings in Charlotte on or around October 29th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS IN MY BACKYARD W. MY DOG AND TAKING PICTURES OF THE CLOUDS. SAW JET HIGH IN THE SOUTH (TOWARD THE SUN) AND THEN NOTICES A REFLECTION A LEAST 20 FEET BELOW IT AND STARTED TAKING PICTURES IN THAT AREA. REVIEWING THE PICTURES LATER THAT EVENING, ORBS ARE IN THE PHOTOS. I SHOULD SAY THAT ACTIVITY HAS INCREASED FOR DUE TO COMMUNICATIONS THROUGH THOUGHTS. I KNOW HOW THIS SOUNDS BUT IT'S TRUE.
